requests.query:
(if_statement
  condition: (parenthesized_expression
    (_)? @if.condition)
  consequence: (compound_statement
    (if_statement
      condition: (parenthesized_expression
        (_)? @if.condition)
      consequence: (compound_statement) @if.body
      alternative: (_)? @if.else))
  alternative: (_)? @if.else) @definition.control_statement
